learn: This is where you’ll find basic information on your external fulfillment for 3rd party services (like kickstarter).

copy.firstuse: Fulfillment jobs hold all the information about your customer orders from a 3rd party. (like Kickstarter) They are used to consolidate the information into easy, manageable sections so you can make sure everyone gets what they paid for!
copy.no_tiers: There are currently no tiers set up for this job.
copy.get_started: I don’t want to add a mass mailing connection at the moment, I'll add it later. I’d like to get started and create a new job.
copy.no_jobs: There are currently 0 jobs. Add one to get started.
